alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:03PM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Perry, George and Greene Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, Beaumont...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, some county roads in the area will become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Monday was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.5 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
